title: 108_hr1821
content: Authorizes: (1) the Speaker of the House of Representatives and the President Pro Tempore of the Senate to arrange for the presentation to Dr. Dorothy Height of a congressional gold medal in recognition of her many contributions to the Nation. And (2) the Secretary of the Treasury to strike such medal and to strike and sell bronze duplicates. Authorizes charging an amount to pay the cost of the gold medal against the United States Mint Public Enterprise Fund.
